Terms of Service Privacy Policy 843.203.0922 SHOP GIFT CARDS STORE 
Fiat Lux
Charleston’s premier rooftop dining 
This rooftop bar delights all of the senses. It’s the destination for specialty cocktails and an extensive wine list with spectacular panoramic views overlooking the Holy City. Here, sunset is best paired with a bottle of rosé.
See Inside Daytime Attire - Casual dry pool or swim attire is acceptable. Shirt, swimsuit cover-ups and footwear are required. Evening Attire - Collared shirt required for gentlemen.  Well-kept denim and dress shorts are acceptable. Hat Policy - Gentlemen’s hats and caps are not permitted in any of the indoor dining or bar venues. Gentlemen are permitted to wear outdoor hats at outdoor venues. Women are permitted to venue-appropriate hats prior to 5 p.m. or dressier hats before or after 5 p.m. 
Hours
Sunday - Thursday | 11:00 am - 10:00 pm 
Friday - Saturday | 11:00 am - 12:00 am

Food Service Daily | 11:30 am - 9:00 pm

[Page Title: Spa and Wellness in Charleston, SC | Hotel Bennett - Treatment MenuHotel Bennett CharlestonHotel Bennett Charleston]

Skip to main content 
We have updated our and , which you agree to accept by continuing to use this site. Click the links to review.
Terms of Service Privacy Policy 843.203.0922 SHOP GIFT CARDS STORE 
Specials and Promotions

View Treatment Menu
(opens in a new tab) 
Book an Appointment

Gift Cards

Seasonal Spa Specials
Champagne of the Sea Body Treatment Begin the New Year immersed in coastal elegance. Our signature Champagne of the Sea Body Treatment features a luminous full-body exfoliation followed by a self-warming marine mud application along the spine—melting away tension and promoting deep detoxification. The experience concludes with a complimentary glass of sparkling rosé, offering a celebratory moment of relaxation. 60 min 255.00 Holiday Fig Ritual Body & Massage Treatments 
60 minutes of blissful relaxation with Fig-infused oils, melting away tension and renewing your senses
– Fig & Tranquility Massage 60 min 250.00 | 90 min 345.00 
Exquisite full-body exfoliation followed by a nourishing Fig oil hydration finish, leaving skin radiant and soft
– Fig Renewal Body Scrub | 235.00 
A sumptuous warm wrap infused with rich Fig moisturizer to envelop your body in comfort and seasonal indulgence|
– Fig Body Wrap 245.00 Lowcountry Luxe CBD Stone Ritual | Seasonal Winter Exclusive Inspired by Charleston’s serene coastal winters, this deeply comforting ritual blends warmed, polished stones with Acrely’s premium full-spectrum CBD oil. Slow, intentional stonework melts away muscle tension while CBD delivers powerful calming and anti-inflammatory benefits, making it ideal for easing seasonal stress, soothing winter stiffness, and giving guests a meaningful sense of place. Optional Enhancement: Acrely Hair & Scalp Treatment — fully integrated into the 90-minute experience for nourishing scalp relaxation and softer hair. 90 min 355.00 Holy City Winter Radiance Facial | Seasonal Winter Exclusive Restore your skin during Charleston’s cool winter months with a hydrating, revitalizing facial using Omoró’s mineral-rich products. Gentle exfoliation, a nourishing mask, and a calming facial massage work together to deeply hydrate, restore glow and luminosity, and soothe sensitive or stressed skin—perfect for combating winter dryness, easing post-holiday fatigue, or enjoying a radiant seasonal reset. 60 min 250.00 Winter Serenity Weekdays Chilly Charleston days deserve extra warmth. Enjoy a complimentary hot stone enhancement with any 60+ minute massage or facial Monday–Thursday to elevate your midweek treatment.

Fiat Lux
Charleston’s premier rooftop dining 
This rooftop bar delights all of the senses. It’s the destination for specialty cocktails and an extensive wine list with spectacular panoramic views overlooking the Holy City. Here, sunset is best paired with a bottle of rosé.
See Inside Daytime Attire - Casual dry pool or swim attire is acceptable. Shirt, swimsuit cover-ups and footwear are required. Evening Attire - Collared shirt required for gentlemen.  Well-kept denim and dress shorts are acceptable. Hat Policy - Gentlemen’s hats and caps are not permitted in any of the indoor dining or bar venues. Gentlemen are permitted to wear outdoor hats at outdoor venues. Women are permitted to venue-appropriate hats prior to 5 p.m. or dressier hats before or after 5 p.m. 
Hours
Sunday - Thursday | 11:00 am - 10:00 pm 
Friday - Saturday | 11:00 am - 12:00 am

Food Service Daily | 11:30 am - 9:00 pm

Offers

Midweek King's Club Access
Book Now 
The King’s Club redefines the luxury hotel experience providing a key-access retreat that combines intimacy, comfort, and exclusivity with personalized service and attention to detail.
This spacious private lounge on the sixth floor features unique amenities and offerings, including a dedicated concierge, spa enhancements, a private terrace with sweeping city views, and continuous beverage and culinary presentations throughout the day. Enjoy up to 20% savings with our Midweek King’s Club Access offer. Subject to availability, blackout dates may apply. Not available to groups or combinable with other offers. 72-hour cancellation policy. Minimum two-night stay over weekdays, three-night stay over weekends.

Winter Wellness

Thinking ahead has its perks. Save 10% when you book at least 21 days in advance. For a limited time, guests can also enjoy this offer with just 14 days' notice for stays in July and August.

The Firefly Experience

We have teamed up with Charleston's iconic Firefly Distillery for a special spirited experience. Creators of the world's first Sweet Tea Vodka, Firefly is a Charleston staple, nestled amongst live oaks and Spanish moss in the Park Circle neighborhood of North Charleston.
